tasks.title: Enhance Camera Filter Performance
tasks.description: Optimize camera filter rendering and add new Snapchat-style filters for better user engagement
tasks.details:
Improve the camera filter system by:
1. Optimizing filter rendering performance using React Native Skia
2. Adding face detection for better filter positioning
3. Implementing new AR-style filters (sparkles, color gradients, face morphing)
4. Adding filter preview thumbnails in the camera interface
5. Implementing filter favorites and recently used sections
tasks.testStrategy: Test camera performance on various devices, validate filter accuracy with face detection, measure frame rates, and conduct user testing for filter engagement

tasks.title: Optimize AI-Powered RAG Recommendation System
tasks.description: Enhance the RAG system for better user matching and content recommendations based on interests and location
tasks.details:
Improve the RAG system by:
1. Enhancing vector similarity matching for user interests
2. Implementing real-time location-based context in recommendations
3. Adding machine learning pipeline for interest inference from user behavior
4. Optimizing database queries for faster recommendation generation
5. Adding A/B testing framework for recommendation algorithms
6. Implementing feedback loops to improve recommendation accuracy
tasks.testStrategy: Test recommendation accuracy with sample user data, measure query performance, validate location-based matching, and run A/B tests on recommendation algorithms

tasks.title: Implement Real-time Chat System Improvements
tasks.description: Enhance the chat system with better real-time messaging, media sharing, and conversation management
tasks.details:
Improve chat functionality by:
1. Implementing WebSocket connections for real-time messaging
2. Adding message delivery status indicators (sent, delivered, read)
3. Implementing media sharing (photos, videos) within chats
4. Adding emoji reactions and message replies
5. Implementing chat message search functionality
6. Adding conversation archiving and management features
7. Implementing push notifications for new messages
tasks.testStrategy: Test real-time message delivery, validate media sharing across devices, test notification delivery, and conduct load testing for multiple concurrent conversations

tasks.title: App Store Submission Optimization
tasks.description: Prepare and optimize the app for App Store submission with proper metadata, screenshots, and compliance
tasks.details:
Prepare for App Store submission by:
1. Creating App Store Connect listing with optimized keywords
2. Generating high-quality app screenshots and videos
3. Writing compelling app description and feature highlights
4. Ensuring compliance with App Store guidelines
5. Setting up app pricing and availability
6. Configuring in-app purchases if needed
7. Testing the app submission process in TestFlight
tasks.testStrategy: Review all App Store guidelines, validate app metadata, test TestFlight distribution, and ensure all screenshots and videos meet Apple's requirements

tasks.title: Performance Monitoring and Analytics Integration
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive analytics and performance monitoring for production insights
tasks.details:
Set up monitoring and analytics by:
1. Integrating Firebase Analytics for user behavior tracking
2. Implementing crash reporting with detailed error logs
3. Adding performance monitoring for app startup and key user flows
4. Setting up custom events for onboarding tutorial completion
5. Implementing user engagement metrics tracking
6. Adding location-based discovery success rate metrics
7. Setting up automated alerts for critical issues
tasks.testStrategy: Validate analytics data collection, test crash reporting with intentional errors, verify performance metrics accuracy, and ensure privacy compliance for data collection
